definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
to make a mess of sth/to bungle/to mismanage

sentences.english: There is no other pearl to be found in the shadowy folds of life.
sentences.chinese: 在生活的黑暗褶子里，是找不到其他的珍珠的。

sentences.english: The creases in her skin hid the shape and color of her eyes.
sentences.chinese: 她皮肤上的褶子遮住了她眼睛的形状和颜色。

sentences.english: The folds in the material will soon wear out.
sentences.chinese: 那料子上的褶子穿穿就很快会没有了。
这是一件打褶子的裙子。
她用粗针脚把褶子都缝住了。

sentences.english: Rumple child produced mainly attributable to the paper around the edge of the deformation.
sentences.chinese: 产生这类褶子的主要原因是纸张四周变形。

sentences.english: The old man' s face was covered in lines and wrinkles.
sentences.chinese: 那老人的脸上布满皱纹和褶子。

sentences.english: A small fold or pucker made by gathering cloth.
sentences.chinese: 那老人的脸上布满皱纹和褶子。

sentences.english: The sheets on my bed have rucked up.
sentences.chinese: 我床上的床单有褶子了。

sentences.english: I always iron out the folds in new sheets, so that they are more comfortable to sleep in.
sentences.chinese: 我总是把新床单的褶子熨平，这样躺上去就更舒服了。

sentences.english: I like the pleat in the front.
Zhezai living in the dark, there was no other pearls of.
sentences.chinese: 在生活的黑暗褶子里，是找不到其他的珍珠的。

definition: dimple/also written 酒渦|酒涡[jiu3 wo1]
